Class addappointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.addappointmentController
public class addappointmentController extends Object
This controller is responsible for the Add Appointment Window(addappointment.fxml)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the Contact Combobox, sets the initial value to the first Contact name

    • withinBusinessHours

      private boolean withinBusinessHours(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      checks if appointment is made within valid business hours, defined as 08:00-22:00.
      Parameters:
      start - starting time and date of the attempted appointment
      end - ending time and date of the attempted appointment
      Returns:
      false if the appointment is made outside Business hours, true if the appointment is within business hours.

    • noAppointmentOverlap

      private boolean noAppointmentOverlap(int customerID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer of whom the appointment is to be made.
      start - starting date and time of the attempted appointment
      end - ending date and time of the attempted appointment
      Returns:
      false if the appointment has an overlap with another, true if there is no overlap.

    • Add

      private void Add()
      Attempts to add an Appointment to the database, and to the Appointments list when this button is pressed.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(Appointment appointment, LocalDateTime startUTC, LocalDateTime endUTC)
      Attempts to add an Appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment that has been created in Add() is passed in order to be added into the database.
      startUTC -
      endUTC -

    • Cancel

      private void Cancel()
      Pressing the Cancel button calls the closeWindow method.

    • closeWindow

      private void closeWindow(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Pressing the Cancel button calls the closeWindow() method.
      Parameters:
      button - a button that should initiates the exiting of this window is passed in.

    • generateID

      private int generateID()
      Starting from 1, for each iteration, keep adding 1 until an ID in the Appointment list has not been taken is found.
      Returns:
      the lowest positive integer that has not been taken as the new Appointment ID.
